content: k1 sk2togp k1 yo k4 * repeat * * 12 times more k1 sm k6 yo k3 row 14 k3 purl till last 3 sts k3 row 15 k3 yo k7 sm * k6 yo sk2togp yo k5 * repeat * * 12 times more k1 sm k7 yo m yo k7 sm * k6 yo sk2togp yo k5 * repeat * * 12 times more k1 sm k7 yo k3 row 16 k3 purl till last 3 sts k3 2012 free pattern 4 row 17 knit no increases row 18 ws elastic cast off k1 * k1 transfer 2 sts back to holding needle and k2tog through the back loops * repeat * to * till end of the row tutorial http //www youtube com/watch v=5mgit936vvg weave in all ends and block border chart worked from right to left and from bottom to top chart shows only first half of the shawl after m repeat sts between green lines and end with k3 chart shows only rs row 1 3 5 7 9 11 13 15 row on ws 2 4 6 8 10 12 14 16 k3 purl till last 3 sts k3 row 17 rs knit no increases row 18 ws elastic cast off k1 * k1 transfer 2 sts back to holding needle and k2tog through the back loops * repeat * to * till end of the row tutorial http //www youtube com/watch v=5mgit936vvg weave in all ends and block special thanks to j for making the chart 2012 free pattern
